website_summaries.verdict: Your best bet if you're looking for a traditional Adesso lamp at an affordable price.
pros: Tall lamp that sheds light over a large area
Easy to assemble and reasonably priced

customer_reviews.title: good lamp at a good price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this lamp for our lanai. We wanted something nice but not expensive. This fit the bill perfectly. It comes in three pieces and is extremely easy to assemble - just screw then together on the pre-installed threaded bolts. Ypu just need to make certain that you hand tighten them well, otherwise it could be a little wobbly. The lamp and shade are good quality and look very nice. We would definitely purchase this item again
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It's frustrating for a lamp that I paid good money for
customer_reviews.text: We bought this lamp and I have only had it for just over two months and the three way switch has already stopped working. We have tried multiple bulbs but the switch is broken and only works on one setting. It's frustrating for a lamp that I paid good money for. Otherwise I love how it looks. Update: 1.5 years later. The company replaced the lamp which had the switch going out which was great. We actually have two of these lamps now but both of them randomly flicker. We're going to have to rewire them.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeterskeetin

customer_reviews.title: Unlike other lamps at this price range the base is pretty heavy which makes the lamp pretty sturdy even on ...
customer_reviews.text: It took me a whole 5 minutes to put this thing together. Unlike other lamps at this price range the base is pretty heavy which makes the lamp pretty sturdy even on a thick carpet like I have in my living room. The best thing about this lamp is the shade. It spreads the light out pretty evenly and the light that comes out is beautiful and soft. I just wish it was a little taller.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: it works fine. i JUST got it
customer_reviews.text: it works fine. i JUST got it, i am concerned (and it bares watching) about the length of the bottom screw-in post. i'm not that big of a guy so my hands don't torque much BUT, it was apparently more than enough to make that bottom screw-in post to go beyond the flat plane of the base - so now it wobbles a bit. ALSO i'm concerned about the wear and subsequent electrocution from dragging. i don't plan on doing ANY, but moving MIGHT BE A HASSEL.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: I Love the style of the lamp
customer_reviews.text: I Love the style of the lamp. Also the base is nice and heavy. However the top was put on crooked, and for some reason they painted the top of the lamp underneath the shade white. Usually gold or silver. Other than that it was as pictured. I would still recommend the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a lamp :-)
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is good, the shade shown is not the shade it came with but I am ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pants

customer_reviews.title: but I expected a little better from a fairly pricey lamp
customer_reviews.text: As others have pointed out, the shade looks a bit different than the picture. Also, my posts didn't align perfectly when assembled - someone drilled one of the holes a bit off center, making the whole thing a little crooked. It's still okay, but I expected a little better from a fairly pricey lamp. On the plus side, assembly was simple and the pieces are pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C Lindner

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for a little over a year. It was slightly crooked when put together but no one notice where it was placed. It burns through bulbs like crazy. The socket was always a little hard to get bulbs in and out of but now the bulb is stuck so it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Intrinsic quality and ease of assembly very good. Style super old fashioned, very conservative, boring, just a matter of taste.
customer_reviews.text: Very old fashioned style. Probably my mistake. Nothing wrong with the quality per se, also assembly was easy and quick. But it is definitely a very old fashion style; trust it goes well in a mountain chalet or beside a fireplace, but not at all in a modern, urban setting.
customer_reviews.author: Ulysse888

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - Quality - Fashionable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, high quality, fashionable floor lamp. It goes together very easily & aligns straight. The shade is larger in reality, which is a good thing. I have it placed between 2 chairs in my living room, allowing it to be utilized by both occupants for reading or eating in front of the TV.
customer_reviews.author: CAJUN 2-STEP

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY Item - Came from US Distribution, but Arrived missing major piece - harp & finial. there was no way to attach lamp shade!
customer_reviews.text: FAULTY Item - Came from US Distribution, but Arrived missing major piece - the harp & finial. there was no way of attaching lamp shade. Sadly, another FAULTY product received.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Decent price , looks classy for the price. Easy to assemble! Looking at floor lamps so many are over priced and made cheap. Not that this is the best quality but it's nicer than the metal collage dorm style ones.
customer_reviews.author: jenguin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Floor Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and is a solid sturdy floor lamp. It really looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bright

customer_reviews.title: Lamp shade is beautiful color but the weaving is very coarse
customer_reviews.text: Lamp shade is beautiful color but the weaving is very coarse... so if you like a finer weave on the shade, you can get a new shade and trade it off as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchenadventures

customer_reviews.title: floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: this lamp turned out to be perfect for where I wanted it, very stylish, and I love the lamp shade, the lamp is very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Sastre

customer_reviews.title: ... had to return a different style Adesso lamp for poor quality. However
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering an Adesso lamp as I had to return a different style Adesso lamp for poor quality. However, this lamp is very sturdy and looks great. Exactly as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Target Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very nice standing lamp, has a large shade. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Pam H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome lamps, easy to thread together, well made & just decorative enough to span the centuries for a 1900 summer house.
customer_reviews.author: New Englander

customer_reviews.title: Attractive 3-Way
customer_reviews.text: Attractive lamp. Switch assembly is loose on mine. Probably just a QA miss.
customer_reviews.author: KentuckyRifle

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging ruined the shade
customer_reviews.text: I like the lamp a lot for the price. The lampshade was smashed though and I couldn't figure out how to return only the shade. A replacement shade is $25, so that reduces the value dramatically. The lamp is working well and I like the 3-way bulb.
customer_reviews.author: E Navone

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good & easy enough to assemble. Slight wobble but just fine. I really like this lamp. I gave it 4 stars only because nothing is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mary byrne

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: We were very surprised how beautiful this lamp is.Its plenty tall enough,and it looks like wood and very sturdy.We are Happy!
customer_reviews.author: R.Chin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp but kinda feel like I paid too much. However, I do love that I can shop online and have something shipped to my door so to me, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy floor lamp at a very reasonable price. Super easy to put together and the shade is beautiful! Gorgeous. You can't go wrong...
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I am currently redecorating my bedroom - purchased 2 of these lamps and the floor lamp. Love them! Very easy to assemble. They just accent my bedroom furnishings beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mack

customer_reviews.title: Prettier in person than photo
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous lamp and puts out a good amount of light. It's actually prettier in person than the photo.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lamp! super easy to assemble. The only negative is the unboxing part.... very messy.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the lamp
customer_reviews.text: Although it says 61 inches, I was surprised at how tall it is! I am happy with the lamp, but the lamp shade looks like the burlap needs to be ironed!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Looks more expensive. Nice shade that makes even an energy efficient light look good.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy lamp. Works well. Loved it so much, I bought a second one!

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY - GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. Arrived on time in great condition. It is very sturdy and looks cute and classy. Actually better quality than similar priced items I've purchased in stores. Very pleased with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: warms the room
customer_reviews.text: it's a nice, warm accent in our living room. the shade gives a yellow glow even though we're using energy saver bulbs, which tend to glow blue.
customer_reviews.author: Arash Arabasadi

customer_reviews.title: A good buy for the money when many lams exceeded this ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our lanai and is well balanced and heavy at the bottom to endure any breeze that may come through there. Fits well with our 'neutral' decor and would be exceptional even indoors. A good buy for the money when many lams exceeded this in cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for the living room, doesn't occupy much floor space.
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, nice look in living room; not fancy so doesn't detract from other objects; casts nice warm light.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great quality lamp
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this lamp! It is sturdy, well-made and looks great. The lampshade does have a few loose "strings" here and there, but that is to be expected with the woven style.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice, expensive looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, expensive looking lamp. It's sturdy and very easy to put together. Plus, it has kind of a retro feel that somehow looks modern and fits with almost any decor.

customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice lamp! Shade is not the kind you have to "open" once it arrives and the lamp is substantial. Will for sure order again!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: The lamp shade feels and looks like it was made out of a burlap sack. I returned immediately. You can find much better lamps at Target and Lowes.

customer_reviews.title: Great soft light
customer_reviews.text: Great basic lighting. The lamp is sturdy and provides a three way switch.

customer_reviews.title: Love this floor lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks better than I expected and am very happy with it. It was a breeze to assemble and came packaged very well.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, But Didn't Work For Long
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of this, but the bulb socket was touchy. Any time the lamp was bumped, the bulb would go out. When I went to replace the bulb, it wouldn't stay on at all. It lasted about 6 months tops. Super disappointing, and I am not sure I can return it at this point. I would love a replacement, but worry it would happen a second time if I went to the hassle. (I swapped the shade out for a smaller one BTW, cuz the one it came with was ginormous! It was nice, but I needed something more compact to walk by.)

customer_reviews.title: difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Pole and screwa are difficilt to assemble! Pole ways feel untight.

customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the lamp but a little disappointed with the lamp shade. It looks a little on the cheap side but it will do.

customer_reviews.text: Its such a cool lamp, came slightly fuzzy right out of the box. The black pole components don't line up precisely, but that merely adds to the charm. Installed a 3-way compact fluorescent and it stays on the low setting all the time, and brightens up my dark room! Great lamp :)

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is exactly as pictured and described. It looks just like I thought it would in the spot I had in mind for it. Would definitely buy this again.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp, and the shade is more of a straw brown which was just what I wanted. Nice, sturdy and a great deal. Overall, great quality product and excellent service by the seller!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.

product_meta.title: Adesso 1523-01 Stratton Floor Lamp – Lighting Fixture with Black Finish – Smart Outlet Compatible Floor Lamp. Home Improvement Accessories, 62"
product_meta.description: Style:Floor LampWith a painted black metal pole with a repeating motif resembling carved wood, the Stratton floor lamp is a perfect style for updated traditional or soft contemporary spaces. Try its placement in the den, home office, or wherever you want to add a warm note. The medium brown burlap bell shade is secured with a round black wooden finial. A 3-way rotary socket switch will only work with a 3-way light bulb, otherwise this lamp will function with simple on/off switch at its highest setting. This floor lamp has a black cord and is smart outlet compatible. Bulb is not included. All Adesso lighting products are either UL listed or ETL listed, meaning it has been tested and approved to meet the government-regulated safety standards for the USA. When shopping for lighting products, we recommend to always look for the UL or ETL marks to ensure you are purchasing lighting that has been tested for safety standards by a 3rd party testing lab. Unfortunately, not all lighting products in the marketplace have been through 3rd party safety testing.
feature_bullets: Material: Lighting solution manufactured with high-quality metal. Medium brown burlap bell shade is secured with a round black wooden finial. Lighting fixture features a black finish for finer appearance

Home Improvement Equipment: transitional lamp comes with a metal pole that looks like carved wood and a lovely burlap bell shade. Picture-perfect for illuminating any living space in the most modernized way. Lamp for interior decoration gives a relaxing glow to your inhabited space

Easy to Use Floor Lamp: home furnishing lamp is user-friendly. Easy to install. Smart outlet compatible lamp. Caution must be taken while installing Stratton Floor Lamp. UL (Underwriter’s Laboratory) listed Adesso lighting solution

Adesso Lighting Gear Uses: ideal lamp for improvising indoors and enhancing interiors. Can be used as a house warming gift to a close friend or family member. Perfect to decorate your living room, bedroom or workplace

Durable Lamp for Interior Decoration: has a long-lasting life expectancy. CFL compatible lamp. Takes (1) 150W Incandescent or equivalent CFL for application. Fresh, modern-day, reasonably priced illumination gear

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
